name: Mini Drifters: World Racing '89
description:
Experience the adrenaline-fueled excitement of classic arcade racing action in Mini-Drifters: World Racing '89!

Get behind the wheel and compete in high-speed races on a variety of challenging tracks. But that's not all - switch things up with battle mode and face off against other drivers in frantic vehicular combat, or team up and take on the heart-pumping hockey mode, where you'll need lightning-fast reflexes to outmaneuver your opponents and score the winning goal. With chunky graphics and hectic single screen local multiplayer, this arcade racer is the perfect throwback experience.

Features:
  • Shared screen local multiplayer
  • 3 Unique game-modes (All with CPU racers available)
  • 30 challenging Race tracks
  • 18 tough Battle maps
  • 6 intense Hockey arenas
  • Unlockable cheat-codes and extras
  • Single-Screen arcade carnage!

Important information regarding multiplayer
Unfortunately due to xInput limitations only 4 Xbox game pads (Or other xInput game pads) can be supported at anytime.
